name: DNA Evolution 3D
description:
Run for humankind! Become the greatest hero and save the world!
Collect elements to create a unique superhero. Fight fierce battles and face powerful enemies. Awesome graphics, realistic animations, cool visual effects: play now and enjoy!

What makes this game so fun and exciting?
- A variety of elements to make your one-of-a-kind superhero
- Unlock new elements to get greater powers
- Defeat supervillains in epic final battles
- Realistic graphics

Dare to challenge yourself & you won't get bored!
